import React from 'react' import { useState,useEffect } from 'react' import { Link,useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row,Col,Image,ListGroup,Button,Card, ListGroupItem} from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import products from '../products' import axios from 'axios' function ProductScreen({match}) { //let {id} = useParams(); // const product = products.find((p) => p._id == id) //s remove from all produccts after using axios const[product,setProduct] = useState([]) useEffect(()=>{ async function fetchProduct(){ const{data}= await axios.get(`/api/products/${match.param.id}`) setProduct(data) } fetchProduct() },[]) return (
Go Back

{product.name}

 Price : ${product.price} Decription : {product.description } Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock' }
) } export default ProductScreen
